content.body: bakkot: can we host that somewhere that's controlled by the committee instead?
content.formatted_body: bakkot: can we host that somewhere that's controlled by the committee instead?

content.body: Michael Ficarra: It's on github pages
do you want push access to the repo, or?
but also we relied on a logbot hosted by a non-committee member for the last several years, which was fine
so it does not seem particularly pressing to me
I meant the domain, shouldn't it be easy to be something like `tc39.es/matrixlogs` by transferring to the tc39 org?
content.formatted_body: I meant the domain, shouldn't it be easy to be something like tc39.es/matrixlogs by transferring to the tc39 org?

content.body: I don't intend it to be just for tc39; it also hosts logs for whatwg, and I will probably add more if people ask for them. and I don't really want to run multiple instances of it
